channel.title: Flooding
channel.description: Hi I have a server that has like an anti flooding, its really annoying i would love to know how to fix this like for example, when a person clicks "log in" then it will say "your account is already logged in" then they do it about 2 more times then it says "You have been banned for Flooding the server" so if anyone knows how i can get rid of this that would be great. I'll Rep +

item.title: Flooding
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

Hi I have a server that has like an anti flooding, its really annoying i would love to know how to fix this like for example, when a person clicks “log in” then it will say “your account is already logged in” then they do it about 2 more times then it says “You have been banned for Flooding the server”
so if anyone knows how i can get rid of this that would be great. I’ll Rep +
